name: Black Friday Blitz (DevClos)
description:
A computer error has set all Black Friday deals to 100% off. This has set consumers into a frenzy where they will do anything to get these deals. Corporate has tasked you with defending against hordes and hordes of mindless consumers until Black Friday is over.

Controls:

Use mouse button one and mouse button two to select and deselect items throughout the game.

WASD- To move you character.

Enter- To turn back on generators.

Project for Game Dev 2 at DePaul University.

Carlos Ruiz - Programmer/Designer.

Taban Lewis - Sound design/Designer.

Sally Le - Artist/Designer.

Tommy Christ - Designer.

Jamie Eastmond - Designer.
